verses.name: Joshua 12:8
verses.text: In the mountains, and in the valleys, and in the plains, and in the springs, and in the wilderness, and in the south country; the Hittites, the Amorites, and the Canaanites, the Perizzites, the Hivites, and the Jebusites:

verses.name: Joshua 12:9
verses.text: The king of Jericho, one; the king of Ai, which is beside Beth–el, one;

verses.name: Joshua 12:10
verses.text: The king of Jerusalem, one; the king of Hebron, one;

verses.name: Joshua 12:11
verses.text: The king of Jarmuth, one; the king of Lachish, one;

verses.name: Joshua 12:12
verses.text: The king of Eglon, one; the king of Gezer, one;

verses.name: Joshua 12:13
verses.text: The king of Debir, one; the king of Geder, one;
